description:
Embark on greater adventures and ski deeper into the wilderness, the XP 12 delivers a wide platform for navigating pristine, untouched snow. Designed exclusively for use with the XPLORE binding for enhanced mobility during tours while ensuring optimal control during descents. The dual lace system lets you tailor your experience to the specific terrain and conditions you encounter.

  • SpringPin™ technology makes stepping in even easier
  • Abrasion-resistant rand protects from ski edges
  • Dual speed lace system lets you adjust the upper and lower boot independently
  • XPLORE SOLE
name: Rossignol XP-12 Classic Boots - Unisex
